description: When I'm summoned, give other allied Spiders +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allied Spiders +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise
name: Frenzied Skitterer
